nodes.id: 农村人民公社工作条例（草案）

zh-cn: 农村人民公社工作条例（草案）

description.zh-cn: 1961年3月由中共中央工作会议通过的关于农村人民公社工作的指导性文件，共60条，对后来的农村政策产生了深远影响。
description.en: A guiding document on the work of rural people's communes passed by the Central Work Conference of the CPC in March 1961, consisting of 60 articles, which had a profound impact on subsequent rural policies.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中国人民解放军和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人。在此事件中，他重视生产队的地位和权力，并主持会议推动了《农村人民公社工作条例》的制定。
description.en: The main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China, the People's Liberation Army, and the People's Republic of China. In this event, he emphasized the status and power of the production team and presided over meetings to promote the formulation of the 'Regulations on the Work of Rural People's Communes'.

description.zh-cn: 指从事农业生产的劳动者阶层。人民公社化运动中的平均主义等问题曾破坏了农民的生产积极性。
description.en: Refers to the social class of laborers engaged in agricultural production. Issues such as egalitarianism during the People's Commune Movement undermined the peasants' enthusiasm for production.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国在特定历史时期的一种“政社合一”的社会基层组织。其规模过大和平均主义倾向被认为束缚了生产力的发展。
description.en: A grassroots social organization in the People's Republic of China during a specific historical period, combining government administration and economic management. Its excessively large scale and egalitarian tendencies were considered to have fettered the development of productive forces.

description.zh-cn: 人民公社体制下的基本生产和核算单位，其地位在《农村人民公社工作条例（草案）》中得到确立和加强。
description.en: The basic production and accounting unit under the People's Commune system, whose status was established and strengthened in the 'Draft Regulations on the Work of Rural People's Communes'.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央政治局常委。在此事件中，他主持了《农村人民公社工作条例（草案）》的起草工作。
description.en: Chinese politician, former member of the Standing Committee of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee. In this event, he presided over the drafting of the 'Draft Regulations on the Work of Rural People's Communes'.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任毛泽东的政治秘书。在此事件中，他辅助陶铸起草《农村人民公社工作条例（草案）》。
description.en: Chinese politician, who served as Mao Zedong's political secretary. In this event, he assisted Tao Zhu in drafting the 'Draft Regulations on the Work of Rural People's Communes'.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任农业部部长。参与了《农村人民公社工作条例（草案）》的起草。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Minister of Agriculture. Participated in the drafting of the 'Draft Regulations on the Work of Rural People's Communes'.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任毛泽东的秘书。参与了《农村人民公社工作条例（草案）》的起草，并起草了《关于改变农村人民公社基本核算单位问题的指示》。
description.en: Chinese politician, former secretary to Mao Zedong. Participated in the drafting of the 'Draft Regulations on the Work of Rural People's Communes' and drafted the 'Directive on Changing the Basic Accounting Unit of Rural People's Communes'.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央总书记和国务院总理。参与了《农村人民公社工作条例（草案）》的起草。
description.en: Chinese politician, former General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee and Premier of the State Council. Participated in the drafting of the 'Draft Regulations on the Work of Rural People's Communes'.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，参与了《农村人民公社工作条例（草案）》的起草。
description.en: Chinese politician, participated in the drafting of the 'Draft Regulations on the Work of Rural People's Communes'.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，马克思主义理论家，曾任中共中央政治局委员。参与了《农村人民公社工作条例（草案）》的修改工作。
description.en: Chinese politician and Marxist theorist, former member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee. Participated in the revision of the 'Draft Regulations on the Work of Rural People's Communes'.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国主席。在1961年广州中央工作会议期间，主持了三北会议。
description.en: Chinese politician, former President of the People's Republic of China. During the 1961 Guangzhou Central Work Conference, he presided over the Sanbei (Three-North) meeting.

description.zh-cn: 1961年3月在广州召开的中共中央工作会议，会议讨论并最终通过了《农村人民公社工作条例（草案）》。
description.en: A Central Work Conference of the CPC held in Guangzhou in March 1961, which discussed and ultimately passed the 'Draft Regulations on the Work of Rural People's Communes'.

description.zh-cn: 1961年5月至6月在北京召开的中共中央工作会议，会议形成了《农村人民公社工作条例（修正草案）》。
description.en: A Central Work Conference of the CPC held in Beijing from May to June 1961, which formulated the 'Revised Draft Regulations on the Work of Rural People's Communes'.

nodes.id: 农村人民公社工作条例（修正草案）

zh-cn: 农村人民公社工作条例（修正草案）

description.zh-cn: 1961年6月通过的《农村人民公社工作条例》的修正版本，取消了供给制和公共食堂制度。
description.en: The revised version of the 'Regulations on the Work of Rural People's Communes' passed in June 1961, which abolished the supply system and the public canteen system.

nodes.id: 供给制 (中华人民共和国)

zh-cn: 供给制 (中华人民共和国)

description.zh-cn: 一种按需分配生活资料的制度，在《农村人民公社工作条例（修正草案）》中被正式取消。
description.en: A system of distributing living materials according to need, which was formally abolished in the 'Revised Draft Regulations on the Work of Rural People's Communes'.

description.zh-cn: 人民公社时期的一种集体餐饮制度，在《农村人民公社工作条例（修正草案）》中被实际上取消。
description.en: A collective dining system during the People's Commune period, which was effectively abolished in the 'Revised Draft Regulations on the Work of Rural People's Communes'.

description.zh-cn: 1961年夏秋在庐山召开的中共中央工作会议。
description.en: A Central Work Conference of the CPC held at Lushan in the summer and autumn of 1961.

nodes.id: 关于改变农村人民公社基本核算单位问题的指示

zh-cn: 关于改变农村人民公社基本核算单位问题的指示

description.zh-cn: 由田家英起草，经七千人大会讨论通过的中央文件，主张将人民公社的基本核算单位划小到相当于初级社的规模。
description.en: A central document drafted by Tian Jiaying and passed after discussion at the Seven Thousand Cadres' Conference, which advocated for reducing the basic accounting unit of the people's communes to a scale equivalent to that of elementary co-operatives.

description.zh-cn: 1962年初中共中央召开的扩大的中央工作会议。会上讨论通过了《关于改变农村人民公社基本核算单位问题的指示》。
description.en: An enlarged Central Work Conference held by the CPC Central Committee in early 1962. The conference discussed and passed the 'Directive on Changing the Basic Accounting Unit of Rural People's Communes'.

description.zh-cn: 1962年9月召开的中国共产党第八届中央委员会第十次全体会议，会上通过了第三个版本的《农村人民公社工作条例》。
description.en: The 10th Plenary Session of the 8th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China held in September 1962, which passed the third version of the 'Regulations on the Work of Rural People's Communes'.

description.zh-cn: 1978年召开的中国共产党第十一届中央委员会第三次全体会议，会上通过了第四个版本的《农村人民公社工作条例》。
description.en: The 3rd Plenary Session of the 11th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China held in 1978, which passed the fourth version of the 'Regulations on the Work of Rural People's Communes'.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东重视生产小队（即生产队）的地位和权力，认为这是调动农民积极性的关键。
description.en: Mao Zedong attached great importance to the status and power of the production team, believing it was key to mobilizing the enthusiasm of the peasants.

relationships.target: 农民

description.zh-cn: 人民公社规模过大以及随之而来的平均主义，破坏了农民的生产积极性，束缚了生产力的发展。
description.en: The excessively large scale of the people's communes and the accompanying egalitarianism undermined the peasants' enthusiasm for production and fettered the development of productive forces.

description.en: Decided to submit the 'Directive on Changing the Basic Accounting Unit of Rural People's Communes' drafted by Tian Jiaying to the upcoming Central Work Conference for discussion and decision.

relationships.target: 生产队

description.zh-cn: 该条例确定了以生产队为基本核算单位的人民公社体制。
description.en: This regulation established the people's commune system with the production team as the basic accounting unit.

relationships.source: 农村人民公社工作条例（草案）
relationships.target: 农民

description.zh-cn: 该条例规定社员的私有财产“永远归社员所有，任何人不得侵犯”，并明确了家庭副业的经营范围，保障了农民的利益。
description.en: The regulation stipulated that the private property of commune members 'shall forever belong to the members and shall not be infringed upon by anyone,' and defined the scope of family sideline businesses, thus safeguarding the interests of the peasants.
